definition: lost/missing/forsaken/dissolute/(of a woman) beautiful/fault/offense/hermit/variant of 逸[yi4]
variant of 驕奢淫逸|骄奢淫逸[jiao1 she1 yin2 yi4]

sentences.english: Do you know any funny or interesting stories or anecdotes related to exams?
sentences.chinese: 你知道和考試有關的有趣故事和佚聞嗎？

sentences.english: People in the town show no interest in ordinary anecdotes.
sentences.chinese: 小鎮上的人們對一般性的佚聞都不感興趣。

definition: edition (of a book) currently in circulation
to amputate one or both feet (punishment in imperial China)/see also 五刑[wu3 xing2]
"Summary of the Collection of Rhymes Old and New", supplemented and annotated Yuan dynasty version of the no-longer-extant late Song or early Yuan "Collection of Rhymes Old and New" 古今韻會|古今韵会
pinyin: Gu3 jin1 Yun4 hui4 Ju3 yao4

definition: youngest brother/a period of two or three months
to proofread/to revise one or more editions of a text using an authoritative edition as a source book/to editorially revise a text
to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism
"Erya" or "The Ready Guide", first extant Chinese dictionary, c. 3rd century BC, with glossaries on classical texts
